item.description:
Red Sox Natives are offering this Weekend Trip through Games Away Tours Inc.

See the Red Sox play the Pittsburgh Pirates in at PNC Park from Friday, June 24 - Sunday June 26

Your Red Sox vs Pirates Weekend Includes Multiple Options for jet transportation,  motorcoach transportation,  hotel transfers, hotel accommodations, reserved upper grandstand seats, field box seat tickets and more.  See 2 or 3 games. Stay 4 blocks from the park at the Wyndham Hotel. 

All applicable taxes are included.

Reservations must be made at least 35 days prior to departure.

Prices start at $649.00 per person. Lower priced Motorcoach option to be announced. 

For complete information, options, upgrades and prices please call Paul Kane at 617.426.3164 at Games Away Tours Inc. or go to www.gamesawaytoursinc.com Let him know you are a Red Sox Natives member.

Details may change. It is your responsibility to contact Games Away Tours Inc. and verify all travel and ticket information. We can not answer any of these questions.

Please ask to be seated with other Red Sox Natives when you register and email the organizer after you have purchased your reservation.

We have additional getaways posted on www.redsoxnatives.com
item.how_to_find_us: Game Away Tours will notify you of departure time.
item.name: Weekend Trip Red Sox vs Pittsburgh Pirates at PNC Park in Pittsburgh PA
